title: Xbox Says PlayStation Pays to Keep Games Off Game Pass - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.11.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Xbox's accusation of PlayStation's Game Pass blocking fees, Dragon Ball coming to Fortnite, and Fall Guys' Sonic The Hedgehog event.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:42 - Housekeeping

Are you ready to rumble? Friday, we're doing a sponsored Rumbleverse stream with a buncha guests from Iron Galaxy to talk about the launch of their brawler royale! Come play with Greg and Mike in private Kinda Funny matches after KFGD at 11 am PT!

The Roper Report  -

00:04:09 - God of War Ragnarok is reportedly causing other developers to move their games
00:10:46 - Microsoft claims Sony pays for ‘blocking rights’ to keep games off Xbox Game Pass
00:24:34 - Could you need a PSN account to play PlayStation games on PC in the future?
00:30:58 - Ad
00:33:00 - Dragon Ball is coming to Fortnite
00:37:17 - Fall Guys is having a huge Sonic event
00:42:53 - Microsoft says Elden Ring on Game Pass was a bug
00:46:20 - Metal Slug Tactics has been delayed to 2023
00:57:30 - Out today
01:00:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Jirard The Completionist!
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
